CustomField.description: Fee Earners track hours. All lawyers are timekeepers, but some non-lawyers are also timekeepers, like people in litigation support or paralegals. Elite charges for software based on the number of Timekeepers. Timekeepers are called Fee Earners in the UK.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Fee Earners track hours but may not necessarily be lawyers i.e. paralegals
CustomField.label: Fee Earners
